text:
~Myaqj~jEShvIDya#H ||
viSvE# dEqvA aqBi mAmA&va#vRutran pUqShA saqnyA sOmOq rAdha#sA dEqvaH sa#viqtA vasO$rvasuqdA vAq rAsvEya#th sOqmA &&*BUyO# Baraq mA pRuqNan pUqrtyA vi rA#dhiq mA&hamAyu#ShA caqndrama#siq mamaq BOgA#ya Bavaq vastra#masiq mamaq BOgA#ya BavOqsrA&siq mamaq BOgA#ya Bavaq hayO#&siq mamaq BOgA#ya Bavaq- [  ] 7
